name: starbase-80
description: Starbase 80 is a self-hosted media and link dashboard styled like a retro space station. It organizes shortcuts, widgets, and stats into a playful, customizable homepage.
features: Retro dashboard: Displays services and links in space station-themed interface.
Service shortcuts: Organizes quick links to self-hosted applications.
Widget system: Adds widgets for weather, time, system stats, and custom data.
Customizable layout: Arranges dashboard elements with drag-and-drop positioning.
Theme options: Switches between retro sci-fi themes and color schemes.
Status monitoring: Shows service health and uptime indicators.
Search functionality: Finds services and links quickly with keyboard shortcuts.
Icon library: Uses built-in icons or custom images for services.
Responsive design: Adapts layout for desktop, tablet, and mobile screens.
No backend required: Runs as static site with configuration in JSON.
Bookmark integration: Imports bookmarks from browsers for quick setup.
Keyboard navigation: Controls dashboard entirely with keyboard shortcuts.
